message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really love.  I'm asking for $175 for it.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $130 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $160.  How about that?
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I'm willing to go up to $140. Can you meet me there?
Bob,  I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $145.  This would be a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to go up to $142. Can you meet me there?
